name: Open IMAPI

screenshots.caption: Main browser to add files and folders to depot

short_description:
Open IMAPI is the Image Mastering Application Interface for Android. IMAPI is known from Microsoft Windows OS. 
Our goal is, to develop a API, the core engine and a driver for Android.
Because Android is basing on Linux 2.6 it is possible to add this feature to Android. With USB OTG (On The Go) the connection of a external burner is possible.

With a brand new, flashed, Samsung Smart Power burning device we have successfully written a DVD on an Acer tablet.

OpenAndoid is now under Development of the company IFoerster Development. This company gave a fre license of their FoxBurner SDK to this project. http://www.ifoerster.com

Soon the first updates will be published here.
summary: Open IMAPI for burning CD/DVD/BD on Android
